alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 12:48PM EST until December 23 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of up to a light glaze. Winds could gust over 50 mph. * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Northern Berkshire County. In Vermont, Bennington and Western Windham Counties. In eastern New York, Hamilton, Northern Warren and Northern Fulton Counties. * WHEN...From 4 PM Thursday to 5 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibilities. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to develop late this afternoon and continue through the evening. The snow is expected to gradually change to plain rain after midnight. Isolated pockets of freezing rain are possible tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
